short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to add a context action and translate and put in your clipboard a snippet of html in jade

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a context action to copy a snippet of html and translate it directly in jade.

Felle free to contribute :
https://github.com/cylwin/chrome-ext-copy-html2jade

Thx
